column1: 将动态骨骼的烘烤范围与时间线同步
column2: Synchronize the dynamic bones baking range with the timeline

column1: 将动画转移到控制骨骼的网格上
column2: Transfer animation to the mesh that controls the bone

column1: 将骨骼恢复到原始状态
column2: Restore the bone to its original state

column1: 将当前参数设置为默认值
调用菜单的 ID 名称
column2: ID name of the menu this was called from

column1: 将所选骨骼的物理特性烘焙为关键帧（播放同步需要在 "每帧播放 "中进行）。
column2: bake the physics of the selected bones into keyframes (Playback sync needs to be in 'Play Every Frame')
Bake the animation of the selected bones

column1: 烘焙范围将与时间线长度一致。
column2: the baking range will follow the timeline length.

column1: 您需要至少完整播放一次动画
column2: You need to play fully the animation at least once

column1: 确保播放同步设置为每帧播放
column2: Make sure that your playback sync is set to play every frame

column1: 仅适用于连接的骨骼，该模式适用于头发或衣服
column2: Only for connected bones, This mode is useful for hair or clothes

column1: 如果希望将活动骨骼作为父对象，请启用此选项
column2: Enable this if you want the active bone to be the parent

column1: 数值越大，关键帧越少，精确度也越低。
column2: Higher number means lower keyframes and less accuracy too.

column1: 如果骨骼链无法正常工作。请尝试更改此参数
column2: If the chain is not working properly. Try changing this parameter

column1: 允许骨骼在旋转的基础上平移
column2: Allow the bone to translate on top of rotating
